name: fullstack-todo-app
description: A fullstack todo application with React/Next.js frontend and Node.js/Express/MongoDB backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Please ensure MongoDB is running, then run: npm run dev'
scripts.mongodb:stop: docker stop todo-mongodb || brew services stop mongodb/brew/mongodb-community
scripts.mongodb:status: curl -s http://localhost:5000/mongodb-status || echo 'Backend not running - start with: npm run dev:backend'
